name: 蒼葉
message: "...Whoa."
I start to feel a little dizzy the moment I step onto the dance floor.
The thumping bass and cacophonous melodies are making me feel ill.
The lights flicker irregularly, making it hard for my eyes to focus. It's all making me extremely uncomfortable.
Are these supposed to be the photonarcotics?
There are a lot of people on the floor, dancing to the beat.
I don't know how they can stand it...

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, are you okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...For now."
It's hard to make out Ren's voice through the music.
Passing by the dance floor, we head up a flight of stairs.
There are booths up here, offering a good view of the floor.
A man meets us at the top of the stairs and takes us to our seats.
Mink plops himself down on a couch and crosses his legs. I sit down next to him.

name: ミンク
message: "Relax already."
I'm surprised to hear those words out of Mink's mouth.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Relax...? Why did we even come here?"

name: ミンク
message: "To stretch our wings a bit."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What? ...Is this your idea of a joke?"
A faint smile crosses Mink's lips.
The lights and sounds are already wearing my patience thin. I don't want to be here a second longer than necessary.
It'd be one thing if we were actually here for a reason, but just to 'spread our wings?' What a fucking joke.
I try to get up from the couch, but stumble.
I feel dizzy. Probably the lights...

name: ミンク
message: "You're high already? This can't be your first time doing drugs."
I grab the back of the couch to steady myself. Though I close my eyes and turn away, I can still see the flashing lights through my eyelids.
The music flows ceaselessly into my ears. It's starting to make me nauseous. I feel a headache building.
...Great. I'm fucking high.
I fish my headache meds out of my bag and cram a few pills down my throat.
When I lift my head, I catch Mink's eyes.
His gaze is so cold it makes me shiver.
Normally I'd be able to meet his glare... but this time, it pierces me like a knife...
...forcing its way deeper... deeper...
...all the way to the deepest part of my soul... and beyond that... deeper still...
I look away, but I can't escape the feeling.
Eyes staring at me endlessly...
Endlessly...
Endlessly...
...Whose eyes?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ughhhhaahh!"
...They're staring at me.
Someone's been staring at me...
...this whole time!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ahhhhhhhh!"
Desperate to escape the eyes on me, I bolt from the booth and down the stairs.

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "Hey buddy, you okay?"

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "Get a grip man! This your first time here? You look pretty fucked up, dude."

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "Dude, so like, fucking on a light high is supposed to blow your freakin' mind. You feelin' anything yet?"

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "So I'm thinkin' why don't we, like, test it out?"

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "Come on man, don't fight it. Just relax and enjoy the ride."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Don't touch me."

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "Huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said don't touch me. Get your hands off me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Get off me."
